item.description:
If you are unable to join HSUS for lobying  during the day, please consider attending the launch party for Massachusetts Voters for Animals that evening. 

There are suggested donation levels to attend.  But, when I spoke to Alexis Fox about the event, she said people can pay whatever they can afford.  It's more important to have a good size crowd in attendance to show support. 

The RSVP, contact Joe Caiazzo at 617.872.6650 or joe@knoxcannon.com. 

Checks can be made to Mass Voters for Animals, brought to the event or mailed to

c/o Sherry Weiland, 11 Homestead Street, Sudbury, MA 01776. 

To donate on line, please visit www.massvotersforanimals.org/donate
item.name: Massachusetts Voters for Animals Launch Party
